topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Backing Up a Volume

body.p: You can create a backup of a volume.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes link.
In the Volumes screen, for the volume you want to backup, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Create Backup.
In the Create Volume Backup dialog box, enter a name and description for the backup.

body.p: The backup is created and is listed on the Volume Backups tab.
